contextId.information: This double negative emphasizes that James was the only apostle whom Paul saw. AT: "the only other apostle I saw was James" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: I saw none of the other apostles except James

contextId.information: Paul uses running as a metaphor for work, and he uses a double negative to emphasize that the work he had done was profitable. AT: "I was doing, or had done, profitable work" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
contextId.quote: I was not running—or had not run—in vain
